story:
IL NOSTRO PROGETTO - OUR PROJECT

COS'E' "BUY WHAT YOU WANT PAYING WHAT YOU HAVE?" - E la parte Social?

WHAT IS "BUY WHAT YOU WANT PAYING WHAT YOU HAVE?" And why Social ?

Il Nostro Progetto di sito web nasce dopo opportune ricerche di mercato che dimostrano quanto il consumismo sia entrato prepotentemente nelle nostre vite. La "necessità" di possedere beni di alto budget anche quando le nostre finanze non ce lo permettono. Sogniamo di possedere l'ultimo modello di qualsiasi cosa, esponendoci a grossi sacrifici economici e privandoci, talvolta, di cose di cui abbiamo bisogno sul serio. Fino ad indebitarci pur di APPARIRE.

Our website project was born after market research that has shown  how consumerism has become a strong part of our lives. The "need" to own  high budget products even if our finances do not allow it. We dream of owning the latest model of anything, exposing  large economic sacrifices and depriving us sometimes of what we really need until we fall into debt.

Proprio per questo motivo sono nati e continueranno a nascere come funghi siti che promettono l’acquisto di un bene di lusso a prezzi stracciati sfruttando meccanismi talvolta poco chiari e poco onesti. Parliamo, delle aste al ribasso e delle aste al centesimo, tanto per fare due esempi.

Precisely for this reason, websites were created that continue to grow like mushrooms, sites that promise the purchase of "luxury at bargain prices" by exploiting sometimes in unclear and dishonest ways, specifically, the Dutch auction and penny auctions, just to cite two examples.

Con il nostro progetto ci proponiamo di abbattere considerevolmente i costi di un prodotto, fino al 60-70 %, senza utilizzare alcun metodo truffaldino ma soltanto permettendoci di spendere ciò che realmente possediamo, non un euro di più, senza però rinunciare al meglio.

With our project, we aim to bring down the cost of a product considerably, up to 60-70%, without using fraudulent methods but at the same time, allowing you to spend what you really have, and not a euro more, without giving up quality.

Noi non alimentiamo false leggende. Con questo progetto non vi promettiamo l’acquisto di un IPHONE (giusto per citare un prodotto in “voga”) a 1-2 € ma semplicemente vi diciamo che potrete acquistarlo spendendo quanto ritenete giusto senza spendere non un euro in più, non un euro in meno.

We don't tell tall tales. With this project we promise not only that you can buy an iPhone at 1-2 € (just to mention one of our hot items) but simply to tell you that you can buy it by spending what you feel is right without spending a euro more, or a euro less.


Andreste in un centro commerciale se sapeste che, quel giorno, a quella determinata ora, tutti i prodotti di consumo saranno scontati del 60%? Sareste disposti a pagare il nuovo modello del vostro cellulare, gioco, tv preferito la metà o anche meno del suo prezzo senza incorrere in metodi truffaldini e senza “tentare la sorte” spendendo più di quanto programmato per rimanere con un pugno di mosche in mano? 

In che modo abbasseremo i prezzi così tanto? Il sistema sfrutterà dei semplici meccanismi che permetteranno un calo drastico del prezzo grazie all'utenza generata dal sito. Inoltre abbiamo preso accordi con alcuni importanti fornitori al livello mondiale. Se date un'occhiata al nostro e-commerce su ebay (attualmente in vacanza) con il nick taba.croci (http://feedback.ebay.it/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewFe...) potrete sicuramente notare dai feedback che già i nostri prezzi sono i più bassi sul mercato italiano. Meno ricarico per noi certo, ma più gente soddisfatta. Dubbi sul meccanismo del sito? Contattateci via mail. Vi daremo tutte le risposte che desiderate. easyseller.society@gmail.com

Would you go to a mall if you knew that on a specific day, at a particular time, all consumer products would be discounted by 60%? Would you buy the new model of your mobile phone, game or tv for half the price, or less, without risk, or spending more than you planned to, only to have nothing, or less than what you wanted?
In which way will we lower price? Our system will exploit some mechanisms that will allow a drastic drop in the price. And we have agreements with some most important suppliers in the world. See our e-commerce on ebay : taba.croci (now in vacation) (http://feedback.ebay.it/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewFe...). We have the lowest price in Italy. Less money for us but more people happy. Do you want more informations on our websites? Send us an email at easyseller.society@gmail.com


Ma la parte social? Avete mai acquistato un oggetto dal web o dal vostro store sotto casa ma non ci avete capito nulla sul funzionamento o sul montaggio? Come noi avete perso ore a girare su internet cercando la soluzione sperata. Noi racchiudiamo tutto in un solo web site che è capace di interagire con le più grandi realtà di social network esistenti e con alcuni dei siti e-commerce più famosi a livello globale. Ogni nostro acquisto potrà essere registrato nella nostra piattaforma con la possibilità di condividerlo o meno. Accedendo alla nostra piattaforma l'utente avrà la possibilità di visionare chi possiede un modello simile o uguale e mettersi in contatto direttamente con il possessore chiedendo spiegazioni su questo o quel problema. Confrontare i prezzi del web o acquistare direttamente dai venditori presenti sulla piattaforma. Ogni utente potrà inserire delle guide o manuali sull'oggetto appena acquistato, oppure rispondere alle perplessità degli altri. Oppure consigliarne o meno l'acquisto. Tutto in una sola piattaforma. Dalla ps4, al trapano, dall'auto al frigorifero. Ci si aiuta reciprocamente e ciò darà ancora ulteriori vantaggi e/o risparmi sul nostro sito. Arrivando a risparmiare ancora di più, in quanto gli utenti attivi avranno accesso ad ulteriori sconti sulla merce in offerta. Un social network degli oggetti! In poche parole:

Vuoi acquistare un oggetto ma non sei sicuro? --> Vieni sulla nostra piattaforma --> verifichi chi lo possiede --> Ti metti in contatto con lui o ne valuti la soddisfazione o lo compri dai venditori consigliati

Hai un problema con un oggetto? --> Vieni sulla nostra piattaforma --> verifichi chi lo possiede --> cerchi le guide o manuali --> ti metti in contatto con chi lo possiede o posti la tua domanda --> i possessori ti illumineranno a riguardo 

Why Social? Have you ever bought an item in Internet or in a store near your house but you didn't know in which way you can mount or adjust it? Or if was it a good item?
In Internet you don't know where can you search for these informations? You can find all that you want in our web site that interacts with the most important social network in the world like facebook or the most important e-commerce sites like Amazon or Ebay. If you want you can share your purchase. One database with million objects. A user can see if someone have that item and post his question or he can speaks directly with owners. Not a people social network but an item social network. Every users can insert manuals or answer questions on that item and recommend or not the purchase of it. And you can buy an item from sellers or you can comparate prices on web. You can find a page for every items with its owners also.
If you'll help something you'll have other benefits or save on our web site. 
In two words: 
Do you want to buy a particular object? --> get access to our platform -->check out who owns it searching for item--> Contact owners and make your questions or buy it from sellers
Have you a problem with a particular object? --> get access to our platform --> check out who owns it searching for item--> see manuals or contact directly owners 


Non abbiamo la pretesa di rivoluzionare il mondo dell’e-commerce. Ma vogliamo provarci. Per questo abbiamo bisogno di voi!

We are not saying that we will revolutionize the world of e-commerce, but we want to try. For this we need you!


CHI SIAMO? WHO ARE WE ?

Semplici ragazzi, laureati ma senza un lavoro fisso che cercano di fare qualcosa di straordinario!

 We are simple people, graduates, but without a steady job who are trying to do something extraordinary!

  • Alessio - 27 anni - direttore di produzione e Marketing - laureato in economia
  • Martina - 22 anni - ideatrice del progetto e produttrice esecutiva - studi di laurea in management aziendale
  • Pierpaolo - 45 anni - programmatore e sistemista - laureato in architettura
  • Angelica - 30 anni - relazioni con il pubblico - non laureata

  • Alessio - 27 y.o. - production worker and marketing - degree in Economics
  • Martina - 22 y.o. - co-creator and executive producer - currently studying for a degree in Business Management
  • Pierpaolo - 45 y.o. - programmer - degree in Architecture
  • Angelica - 30 y.o. - public relations - non-graduate
IL VOSTRO CONTRIBUTO E' ESSENZIALE - YOUR CONTRIBUTION IS ESSENTIAL

Siete una parte indispensabile del progetto. I vostri contributi renderanno possibile la nostra idea. Tutti i soldi raccolti saranno destinati esclusivamente alla produzione di questo innovativo web-site. 

You are an indispensable part of our project. Your contributions will make our idea possible and all monies raised will be used exclusively for the production of this innovative web-site. 

Noi, elencheremo, giorno dopo giorno, tutte le spese effettuate per la realizzazione del progetto. 

We will list, day after day, all costs incurred for the project 

Per chiarezza, però, vogliamo riassumervi a cosa serviranno i vostri contributi: 

・ Pagamento stipendi nuovi programmatori scelti esclusivamente fra chi, in questo periodo di crisi, è senza occupazione. Non cerchiamo gente già impiegata ma persone con tanta voglia di lavorare e che, per un motivo o per l’altro, si trovano in condizioni economiche difficili; 

 ・ Acquisto di server su cui far girare il sito; 

・ Marketing. Senza utenti il nostro progetto morirebbe prima di cominciare, quindi abbiamo bisogno di lanciare una campagna pubblicitaria importante che indirizzi l’utenza sul nostro sito permettendo anche ai più scettici di fidarsi di noi  

 ・ Spese per manutenzione e progettazione 

For clarity, however, we want to summarize what your contributions will be used for: 
・ Paying the salaries of new programmers chosen exclusively among those who, in this time of crisis, are unemployed. We are not searching for those who are already employed, but people with a great desire to work and who, for one reason or another, are in economic difficulty 
・ Purchase of servers to run the site 
・ Marketing. Without clients, our project would die before it even began, so we need to launch a major advertising campaign that encourages the clients on our site, even the most skeptical, to have trust in us. 
・ Expenses for maintenance and design    
POSSO CONTRIBUIRE MA COSA CI RICAVO? - I CAN HELP BUT WHAT WILL I RECEIVE IN RETURN?
Tutti coloro che effettueranno una donazione avranno in cambio qualcosa. Tutte le “ricompense” sono descritte nella parte Perks. 
All those who make a donation will get something in return. All the "rewards" are described in the “Perks” section.
CONDIVIDI LA CAMPAGNA - SHARE CAMPAIGN

Indiegogo permette la condivisione della campagna. Quindi aiutateci, condividete e rendete visibile questo progetto. Contiamo su di voi ed incrociamo le dita.  

Indiegogo allows the sharing of this campaign. So help us, share, and make our project visible so we may be able to afford our expenses. We are counting on your help and we are keeping our fingers crossed. 

Non pretendiamo che il nostro sogno si realizzi, ma ora siamo arenati. Non possiamo più permetterci altre spese. Contiamo su di voi ed incrociamo le dita. Solo chi ci crede può cambiare davvero il mondo! Noi ci crediamo, e voi?

We do not claim that our dream has come true yet, but now we are stranded. We can not afford other expenses. We are counting on your help and we are keeping our fingers crossed. Only those who believe can really change the world! We believe, and you?
story_txt:
IL NOSTRO PROGETTO - OUR PROJECTCOS'E' "BUY WHAT YOU WANT PAYING WHAT YOU HAVE?" - E la parte Social?WHAT IS "BUY WHAT YOU WANT PAYING WHAT YOU HAVE?" And why Social ?


Il Nostro Progetto di sito web nasce
dopo opportune ricerche di mercato che dimostrano quanto il consumismo sia
entrato prepotentemente nelle nostre vite. La "necessità" di
possedere beni di alto budget anche quando le nostre finanze non ce lo
permettono. Sogniamo di possedere l'ultimo modello di qualsiasi cosa,
esponendoci a grossi sacrifici economici e privandoci, talvolta, di cose di cui
abbiamo bisogno sul serio. Fino ad indebitarci pur di APPARIRE.
Our
website project was born after market research that has shown  how consumerism has become a strong
part of our lives. The "need" to own  high budget products even if our finances do not allow it.
We dream of owning the latest model of anything, exposing  large economic sacrifices and depriving
us sometimes of what we really need until we fall into debt.
Proprio per questo
motivo sono nati e continueranno a nascere come funghi siti che promettono
l’acquisto di un bene di lusso a prezzi stracciati sfruttando meccanismi
talvolta poco chiari e poco onesti. Parliamo, delle aste al ribasso e delle
aste al centesimo, tanto per fare due esempi. 
Precisely for this
reason, websites were created that continue to grow like mushrooms, sites that
promise the purchase of "luxury at bargain prices" by exploiting
sometimes in unclear and dishonest ways, specifically, the Dutch auction and
penny auctions, just to cite two examples.
Con il nostro progetto
ci proponiamo di abbattere considerevolmente i costi di un prodotto, fino al
60-70 %, senza utilizzare alcun metodo truffaldino ma soltanto permettendoci di
spendere ciò che realmente possediamo, non un euro di più, senza però
rinunciare al meglio.With our project, we aim to bring down
the cost of a product considerably, up to 60-70%, without using fraudulent
methods but at the same time, allowing you to spend what you really have, and
not a euro more, without giving up quality.Noi non alimentiamo
false leggende. Con questo progetto non vi promettiamo l’acquisto di un IPHONE
(giusto per citare un prodotto in “voga”) a 1-2 € ma semplicemente vi diciamo
che potrete acquistarlo spendendo quanto ritenete giusto senza spendere non un
euro in più, non un euro in meno.We don't tell tall
tales. With this project we promise not only that you can buy an iPhone at 1-2
€ (just to mention one of our hot items) but simply to tell you that you can
buy it by spending what you feel is right without spending a euro more, or a
euro less.
Andreste in un centro
commerciale se sapeste che, quel giorno, a quella determinata ora, tutti i
prodotti di consumo saranno scontati del 60%? Sareste disposti a pagare il
nuovo modello del vostro cellulare, gioco, tv preferito la metà o anche meno
del suo prezzo senza incorrere in metodi truffaldini e senza “tentare la sorte”
spendendo più di quanto programmato per rimanere con un pugno di mosche in
mano? In che modo abbasseremo i prezzi così tanto? Il sistema sfrutterà dei semplici meccanismi che permetteranno un calo drastico del prezzo grazie all'utenza generata dal sito. Inoltre abbiamo preso accordi con alcuni importanti fornitori al livello mondiale. Se date un'occhiata al nostro e-commerce su ebay (attualmente in vacanza) con il nick taba.croci (http://feedback.ebay.it/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewFe...) potrete sicuramente notare dai feedback che già i nostri prezzi sono i più bassi sul mercato italiano. Meno ricarico per noi certo, ma più gente soddisfatta. Dubbi sul meccanismo del sito? Contattateci via mail. Vi daremo tutte le risposte che desiderate. easyseller.society@gmail.comWould you go to a mall
if you knew that on a specific day, at a particular time, all consumer products
would be discounted by 60%? Would you buy the new model of your mobile phone,
game or tv for half the price, or less, without risk, or spending more than you
planned to, only to have nothing, or less than what you wanted?In which way will we lower price? Our system will exploit some mechanisms that will allow a drastic drop in the price. And we have agreements with some most important suppliers in the world. See our e-commerce on ebay : taba.croci (now in vacation) (http://feedback.ebay.it/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewFe...). We have the lowest price in Italy. Less money for us but more people happy. Do you want more informations on our websites? Send us an email at easyseller.society@gmail.com
Ma la parte social? Avete mai acquistato un oggetto dal web o dal vostro store sotto casa ma non ci avete capito nulla sul funzionamento o sul montaggio? Come noi avete perso ore a girare su internet cercando la soluzione sperata. Noi racchiudiamo tutto in un solo web site che è capace di interagire con le più grandi realtà di social network esistenti e con alcuni dei siti e-commerce più famosi a livello globale. Ogni nostro acquisto potrà essere registrato nella nostra piattaforma con la possibilità di condividerlo o meno. Accedendo alla nostra piattaforma l'utente avrà la possibilità di visionare chi possiede un modello simile o uguale e mettersi in contatto direttamente con il possessore chiedendo spiegazioni su questo o quel problema. Confrontare i prezzi del web o acquistare direttamente dai venditori presenti sulla piattaforma. Ogni utente potrà inserire delle guide o manuali sull'oggetto appena acquistato, oppure rispondere alle perplessità degli altri. Oppure consigliarne o meno l'acquisto. Tutto in una sola piattaforma. Dalla ps4, al trapano, dall'auto al frigorifero. Ci si aiuta reciprocamente e ciò darà ancora ulteriori vantaggi e/o risparmi sul nostro sito. Arrivando a risparmiare ancora di più, in quanto gli utenti attivi avranno accesso ad ulteriori sconti sulla merce in offerta. Un social network degli oggetti! In poche parole:Vuoi acquistare un oggetto ma non sei sicuro? --> Vieni sulla nostra piattaforma --> verifichi chi lo possiede --> Ti metti in contatto con lui o ne valuti la soddisfazione o lo compri dai venditori consigliatiHai un problema con un oggetto? --> Vieni sulla nostra piattaforma --> verifichi chi lo possiede --> cerchi le guide o manuali --> ti metti in contatto con chi lo possiede o posti la tua domanda --> i possessori ti illumineranno a riguardo 




Why Social? Have you ever bought an item in Internet or in a store near your house but you didn't know in which way you can mount or adjust it? Or if was it a good item?In Internet you don't know where can you search for these informations? You can find all that you want in our web site that interacts with the most important social network in the world like facebook or the most important e-commerce sites like Amazon or Ebay. If you want you can share your purchase. One database with million objects. A user can see if someone have that item and post his question or he can speaks directly with owners. Not a people social network but an item social network. Every users can insert manuals or answer questions on that item and recommend or not the purchase of it. And you can buy an item from sellers or you can comparate prices on web. You can find a page for every items with its owners also.If you'll help something you'll have other benefits or save on our web site. 

In two words: Do you want to buy a particular object? --> get access to our platform -->check out who owns it searching for item--> Contact owners and make your questions or buy it from sellersHave you a problem with a particular object? --> get access to our platform --> check out who owns it searching for item--> see manuals or contact directly owners 



Non abbiamo la pretesa
di rivoluzionare il mondo dell’e-commerce. Ma vogliamo provarci. Per questo
abbiamo bisogno di voi!

We are not saying that
we will revolutionize the world of e-commerce, but we want to try. For this we
need you!



CHI SIAMO? WHO ARE WE ?


Semplici ragazzi,
laureati ma senza un lavoro fisso che cercano di fare qualcosa di
straordinario!
 We are simple people, graduates, but without a steady job who
are trying to do something extraordinary!


Alessio - 27 anni - direttore di produzione e Marketing - laureato in economia
Martina - 22 anni - ideatrice del progetto e produttrice esecutiva - studi di laurea in management aziendale
Pierpaolo - 45 anni - programmatore e sistemista - laureato in architettura
Angelica - 30 anni - relazioni con il pubblico - non laureata
Alessio - 27 y.o. - production worker and marketing - degree in Economics
Martina - 22 y.o. - co-creator and executive producer - currently studying for a degree in Business Management
Pierpaolo - 45 y.o. - programmer - degree in Architecture
Angelica - 30 y.o. - public relations - non-graduate

IL VOSTRO CONTRIBUTO E' ESSENZIALE - YOUR CONTRIBUTION IS ESSENTIAL



Siete una parte
indispensabile del progetto. I vostri contributi renderanno possibile la nostra
idea. Tutti i soldi raccolti saranno destinati esclusivamente alla produzione
di questo innovativo web-site. 
You are an indispensable part of our project.
Your contributions will make our idea possible and all monies raised will be
used exclusively for the production of this innovative web-site. 
Noi,
elencheremo, giorno dopo giorno, tutte le spese effettuate per la realizzazione
del progetto. 
We will list, day after day, all costs incurred for the project 
Per chiarezza, però, vogliamo riassumervi a cosa serviranno i vostri
contributi: ・ Pagamento
stipendi nuovi programmatori scelti esclusivamente fra chi, in questo periodo
di crisi, è senza occupazione. Non cerchiamo gente già impiegata ma persone con
tanta voglia di lavorare e che, per un motivo o per l’altro, si trovano in
condizioni economiche difficili; 


 ・ Acquisto di server su cui far girare il sito; 


・ Marketing. Senza utenti il nostro progetto morirebbe
prima di cominciare, quindi abbiamo bisogno di lanciare una campagna
pubblicitaria importante che indirizzi l’utenza sul nostro sito permettendo
anche ai più scettici di fidarsi di noi  


 ・ Spese per manutenzione e progettazione 



For clarity, however, we want to summarize what your contributions
will be used for: ・
Paying the salaries of new programmers chosen exclusively among those who, in
this time of crisis, are unemployed. We are not searching for those who are
already employed, but people with a great desire to work and who, for one reason
or another, are in economic difficulty ・
Purchase of servers to run the site ・
Marketing. Without clients, our project would die before it even began, so we
need to launch a major advertising campaign that encourages the clients on our
site, even the most skeptical, to have trust in us. ・
Expenses for maintenance and design

Tutti coloro che
effettueranno una donazione avranno in cambio qualcosa. Tutte le “ricompense”
sono descritte nella parte Perks. 
All those who make a donation will get
something in return. All the "rewards" are described in the “Perks”
section.
CONDIVIDI LA CAMPAGNA - SHARE CAMPAIGN



Indiegogo permette la condivisione della
campagna. Quindi aiutateci, condividete e rendete visibile questo progetto. Contiamo su di voi ed incrociamo le dita.  
Indiegogo allows
the sharing of this campaign. So help us, share, and make our project visible
so we may be able to afford our expenses. We are counting on your help and we
are keeping our fingers crossed. 
Non pretendiamo che il nostro sogno si
realizzi, ma ora siamo arenati. Non possiamo più permetterci altre spese.
Contiamo su di voi ed incrociamo le dita. Solo chi ci crede può cambiare

true yet, but now we are stranded. We can not afford other expenses. We are

believe can really change the world! We believe, and you?

story:
The Problem

Currently, deaf and hard of hearing students that require interpreters are forced to constantly cycle through different interpreters that do not have the skills or the right fit to clearly communicate what is going on in their classes. Often, interpreters will be too slow, too fast, or won’t phrase the student’s questions correctly. In some schools, you can request a different interpreter, however you still have to pick blindly from a variety, often leading to more trouble with misunderstanding. This constant cycle leads to the student falling behind in class and often becoming frustrated with their education altogether.

None of this means interpreters are bad at what they do, in fact Interpreters help the Deaf and HOH community in many ways. It is only that there are many ways to interpret, and sometimes it is not always the best fit for the individual student.

Our Solution

Grade My Terp looks to solve this pressing issue by providing a web interface where students post their own reviews for the interpreters they work with, which then other students can look over and make decisions based on those reviews. The reviews are set up on certain metrics, along with a short written option. Opposing metrics do not necessarily mean an interpreter is performing poorly, it just allows students to find the right fit for them. For example, some students may want an interpreter who signs fast, while others may like it slower. Using this process, students can insure they request an interpreter that will help them best understand their education. 

What We Need & What You Get

The funding goal that we've set is loosely based on an estimate of the costs of starting and maintaining a quality web interface that will work with the level of expansion projected to get us to a level of complete self sufficiency. We have created several great offerings to thank you for your gift:

  • T-Shirt: Get a fresh limited edition T-Shirt with our new, redesigned brand.
  • Name on Finished Site: To thank you, we will put your name historically in a section of our site thanking donors. 
  • Handwritten Thank You Note: For your generosity, receive a mailed note written and signed by all the founders of Grade My Terp
  • Ticket to the Launch Party: Come Celebrate with us! Have your name on an exclusive guest list once we launch the website. Will be held locally in Rochester, NY.
  • Design Input: For your high level of generosity, have consistent input on how the website is going to look once it's done
With any giving amount, you will recieve email updates of our progress. 

The Impact & How You Can Help

Helping us develop this system will mean having a direct effect on the advancement of educational opportunity. If you are able, please consider donating. If you are not, you can still help greatly by spreading the word!

story:
We would like to thank everyone for the massive feedback and support.

We were selected for Startup Bootcamp and moved to Berlin.

Although we decided to suspend the campaign due to the overwhelming feedback, feature and business model changes, we are already partnering with manufacturers in order to produce our wireless parking sensors and incorporate all the feedback we got from you.

If you are among the lucky contributors that had the opportunity to order a wireless parking sensor, you can expect it at your door in the next months.

If you didn’t have the chance to contribute, the good news is we have several distributors interested and hopefully you’ll be able to acquire them in a store near you.

To keep up with with the latest news, follow us on facebook.

Our sincere thanks for your contribute and support.

The Stickables Team!

story:
We are a canine daycare and indoor dog park facility, integrating a bistro catering to professionals with the desire to provide quality time for their pets while they hang out with friends enjoying a cup of joe and catching up on work.

It is a response to a real market need of a one-stop spot for canines to play freely with professional supervision, for their humans to replenish and conquer the world all at once.

We are a strong supporter of dog rescues and animal shelters. There are thousands of dogs in shelters waiting for a home to call their own. We will be working closely with local rescue agencies to help have weekly or monthly dog adoptions fair at our facility. 20% of our profit will be donated to the good cause of helping rescue agencies thrive and succeed in re-homing dogs.


WHERE? 

We hope to open up our first ever facility in Irvine, CA. A dog friendly community where residents from Irvine and neighboring cities can stop by for a cup of coffee with their dogs. We also offer an option for doggy day care. Owners can drop their dog(s) for a fun filled day at our facility, grab a cup of coffee or breakfast to work, and check in on their dog(s) via our webcam. We personally believe that being able to check in on your dog(s) is important to us as dog owners and we truly believe you will feel the same way. 


DOGGY DAY CARE/DOGGY PLAYGROUND

We will be offering several options for your dogs to choose from:

1. A play in our dog area with professional supervision while you enjoy your meal. 

2. Play time at our doggy day care for non-stop fun from the moment you drop them off to the time you pick them up. 


THE BISTRO

We will be offering Asian Fusion cafe cuisines, presenting you the best from both worlds. Americano or VIetnamese Coffee? Turkey Sandwich or Pate Chaud? Your pick. 

The Bistro will be located in an enclosed space within the facility. This will ensure that we practice the best standards provided by the OC Health Department. 

Grab your coffee and your salad/sandwich, and head over to our lounge area where you can eat, work (with our free WiFi connection) and watch your dog play - stress free. 


ANIMAL RESCUES

We are strong supporters of the animal rescue organizations. The local shelters are overcrowded with dogs. We would like to provide an opportunity for future pet parents to look at their dogs at play. This will also help the dogs socialize into the real world, ensuring that the dogs are safe to introduce to humans and other dogs. 


THE FLOOR PLAN

The bistro and the doggy day care will have two separate entrance The bistro will be in an enclosed location with a door connecting to our lounge area where dog owners can relax while watching their dogs play at the playground, monitored by professionals.

story:
Hello :)

My name is John Dufresne I'm a young entrepreneur moving to the Bay Area in California to start a company and work on innovative tech products.


Moving isn't cheap or easy, so I need help.


  • Donate $1 or more
  • Network me with people from the Bay Area
  • Apartment/Room and Job leads
  • Share and Support

Here is an estimated overhead for my first year expenses:  
  1. Rent - $12,000 
  2. Food - $7,400 
  3. Utilities - $3,000 
  4. Transportation - $500


Anyone that donates $1 or more will be on the list for the first people to test FinditCity's beta version


Moving Sale for Locals!

If you are in the area of Southbridge, Mass
I am selling mostly everything I own. 
One of the Perks is a $100 #BuyJohnsThings
Deals for buyers:
$100 - All that you want package which includes on May 2nd and 9th you can come to my house and take any items you want. Excluding the following 
$100 each, first come:
Treadmill - $100
Bow Flex - $100
Car - $3000 (2004 Chrysler Pacifica)
Please inbox me for inquirers. And if you buy the perk I will contact you with an address and phone number. Thank you



The Big Move!
I will be searching for employment and an apartment prior to moving, After I find an apartment and move in May 20th I will if necessary continue to look for a job of any sorts to pay my living expenses while trying to save money for start up funds. 
Your donations will help more than you know! With the success of this campaign I will have the freedom to explore more employment options, and have valuable time seeking investors and partners for my company.
Moving can be stressful, and starting a tech company isn't easy either. Please donate $1 or more to help ensure my success in moving to silicon valley. 
I want to build a great company that will employee thousands of people. I want to design and build innovative products that will bring joy, and information to millions of people. 

Just as important I will need help networking with the tech community in Silicon Valley. I plan on joining business groups in the area, and use social web sites. If you know of anyone in the Bay Area of California that are interested in helping me please make the connection. Money isn't everything, I really need the good of people to make my journey a success. 

I recently visited the Bay Area and it is beautiful. I went with my father to search for apartments/rooms for rent, and to promote this campaign. We had a great time. I am very ambitious to move.

     


Goal

I plan on spending the next three years

  • Developing FinditCity
  • Designing a marketing campaign to reach users globally 
  • Living in the lab
  • Building a corporate administrative structure, Budgeting/Accounting,Sales and Customer Support
  • Guaranteeing the public an extraordinary product that will be useful and fun.
I have a plan and until I find a team of people that want to achieve these goals, I will maintain a job and continue my Venture search. I will never quit being ambitious and I hope to find an investor that loves my vision for tech products and will work with me completely to market innovative products. 


Thank you :)
#HelpJohnMove
I want to thank Indiegogo.com for their support. I also want to thank Fiverr.com and all the sellers on fiverr for helping me with these wonderful videos. I highly recommend using both web sites. Big thanks to my family and friends for their encouragement and support.
And most of all I want to thank everyone that donates time and/or money to help in my journey to Silicon Valley.

                                                    http://www.FinditCity.com


I am also the founder of Southbridge Dog Park and committee. Please visit our Facebook page :) http://www.facebook.com/southbridgedogpark

The dog park could use your support, please contact for more information. Thank you :)



Here is my dog Trina-Tesla, everyone calls her TT. She will be living with my father when I move and until I can afford to give her proper time and space to run around and play... and food, lots of food. 

I will miss her dearly :(

New England Winter of 15'                 She Loves Snow!




Throwback circa 87'
story_txt:
Hello :) My name is John Dufresne I'm a young entrepreneur moving to the Bay Area in California to start a company and work on innovative tech products.

Moving isn't cheap or easy, so I need help.

Donate $1 or more
Network me with people from the Bay Area
Apartment/Room and Job leads
Share and Support


Here is an estimated overhead for my first year expenses:  
Rent - $12,000 
Food - $7,400 
Utilities - $3,000 
Transportation - $500




Anyone that donates $1 or more will be on the list for the first people to test FinditCity's beta version
   Moving Sale for Locals!
If you are in the area of Southbridge, Mass
I am selling mostly everything I own. 
One of the Perks is a $100 #BuyJohnsThings
Deals for buyers:
$100 - All that you want package which includes on May 2nd and 9th you can come to my house and take any items you want. Excluding the following 
$100 each, first come:
Treadmill - $100
Bow Flex - $100
Car - $3000 (2004 Chrysler Pacifica)
Please inbox me for inquirers. And if you buy the perk I will contact you with an address and phone number. Thank you




The Big Move!

I will be searching for employment and an apartment prior to moving, After I find an apartment and move in May 20th I will if necessary continue to look for a job of any sorts to pay my living expenses while trying to save money for start up funds. 
Your donations will help more than you know! With the success of this campaign I will have the freedom to explore more employment options, and have valuable time seeking investors and partners for my company.
Moving can be stressful, and starting a tech company isn't easy either. Please donate $1 or more to help ensure my success in moving to silicon valley. 
I want to build a great company that will employee thousands of people. I want to design and build innovative products that will bring joy, and information to millions of people. 



Just as important I will need help networking with the tech community in Silicon Valley. I plan on joining business groups in the area, and use social web sites. If you know of anyone in the Bay Area of California that are interested in helping me please make the connection. Money isn't everything, I really need the good of people to make my journey a success. 


I recently visited the Bay Area and it is beautiful. I went with my father to search for apartments/rooms for rent, and to promote this campaign. We had a great time. I am very ambitious to move.

     





Goal

 I plan on spending the next three years  Developing FinditCity Designing a marketing campaign to reach users globally 
Living in the lab Building a corporate administrative structure, Budgeting/Accounting,Sales and Customer Support
Guaranteeing the public an extraordinary product that will be useful and fun. 
I have a plan and until I find a team of people that want to achieve these goals, I will maintain a job and continue my Venture search. I will never quit being ambitious and I hope to find an investor that loves my vision for tech products and will work with me completely to market innovative products. 








Thank you :)

I want to thank Indiegogo.com for their support. I also want to thank Fiverr.com and all the sellers on fiverr for helping me with these wonderful videos. I highly recommend using both web sites. Big thanks to my family and friends for their encouragement and support.
And most of all I want to thank everyone that donates time and/or money to help in my journey to Silicon Valley.

story:
Short Summary

Hello! I'm Jillian Schiavi, the hand lettering and illustration artist behind jilly ink. On a snowy tundra-like day in Chicago, I opened the jilly ink Etsy shop with a few hand lettered items, rubber stamps, and some lettering services. Now, three years later, I've leant my work to the wedding industry, hand lettering invitations, envelopes, day-of paper products, and signs. I've also illustrated for editorial publications, custom commissioned pieces, tattoo designs, and retail merchandise. Recently I was featured on the Martha Stewart Instagram feed, and I'm excited for some more avenue through which to share my work with the world!

Up until now, I've been running my business through information I've pulled together from a myriad of resources - online, in books, through the advice of other creative entrepreneurs, etc. Currently I also support myself through teaching yoga, and as an Independent Consultant with Arbonne. My aim is to build jilly ink into a fully functional and self-sustaining creative business, and to prove to myself, as well as other creative entrepreneurs, that the starving artist mentality doesn't have to be true. 

This is where you come in. After doing a lot of research on various methods to up my game in the online marketing world, and harness the power of having an online component to my business, I've chosen two tried and true methods to focus on to bring jilly ink to the next level. I have so much respect for both Marie Forleo and Ramit Sethi, and both of these marketing gurus offer amazing online courses specifically geared towards entrepreneurs with online businesses. Marie Forleo's B School is currently in the enrollment period, so this would be the next opportunity for me to plug in, use the skills I learn, and take my business beyond where it currently resides. 

What you'll be helping me with is not only the knowledge and tangible resources I'll use to further validate and advance jilly ink, but you'll also be helping me live my dream of being a working artist that can still enjoy the benefits of having a stable, strong financial foundation. This is the number one reason why so many creatives quit on their goals and their dreams, and I believe, with your help and my determination, I'll rock the B School curriculum and prove that owning and operating a thriving artistic career can bring beauty and inspiration to others to do the same. 

What I Need & What You Get

You will be helping me with the B School tuition of $2,000 - a steal if you think of what one course in an MBA program costs. The program is 8 weeks long and covers everything from online marketing to copywriting, accounting and bookkeeping, and how to determine a niche market for my products and services. 

In exchange for helping me fund this amazing opportunity, you get some fabulous perks. If you're unfamiliar with my work - go ahead and take a look at my lettering and illustration portfolio over at www.jillyink.com. By contributing to my fundraising goal, you get the following in return:

 - a PDF of one of my original hand lettered and illustrated art pieces


 - a set of my 'love' and 'love is all you need' rubber stamps


 - a custom drawn recipe illustration of your favorite dish, a la the examples from my Dinner Last Night series


 - a hand drawn tattoo design (for you or someone else), originally valued at $250 per design


 - an original commissioned jilly ink illustrated piece of your favorite quote, packaged in a rigid envelope and sent to your house to add to your art collection. 



I realize that sometimes in fundraising, the goal is not met 100%. If this goal isn't fully funded by the B School enrollment closing date of March 4th, my intention is to use the funds you've contributed towards the tuition of Ramit Sethi's next open enrollment of Zero to Launch. This is another online business course that I highly respect, and believe in. I'll keep you up to date on when ZTL opens next, and how I plan to utilize the skills learned from that experience as well. Either way, your funding will generate more knowledge and tools for me to use in building my business outward.


The Impact

There are so many creative entrepreneurs out there that have to rely on alternate income, side jobs, loans, etc. to get their visions and passions off the ground before they can become solely sustained on the thing they love to do. The beauty of creative businesses is that they bring positivity, empowerment, inspiration, and encouragement to the world simply by existing. But I also believe that when a creative business thrives, that energy drives other creatives to build their dreams bigger. By honing my business skills through Marie Forleo's B School, I'll be better equipped to create systems for my business, streamline the backend and marketing efforts, and focus on making work that speaks to people in an engaging and real way. As a bonus, I'll also be able to fire my other side jobs and focus solely on jilly ink. 

I have a successful track record with making the most of, and getting the most out of any course I enroll in. I graduated cum laude with a BA from NYU, and started my business while obtaining my MFA from The School of the Art Institute. I know what it takes to work hard, and to be devoted to a higher purpose. When I enroll in B School, my promise to you, my amazing contributors, is to go all out, play to win, and implement all the skills and tools I learn to bring jilly ink to a national and international level. My ultimate aim is to share my knowledge with other creative entrepreneurs, so as my business grows, so will my contributions to others going through the same process.  

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that finances may be tight for some of you. I'm in the same boat (that's why I'm here!). But there are a few other ways you can help without spending a dime. If my work speaks to you, and you believe I'll benefit from this campaign, I'm imploring you to get the word out and make some noise! Indiegogo has some amazing sharing tools, so utilize them, and let everyone in your neck of the woods know that they have the ability to support my small creative business. I really appreciate all of your support, whether monetary or not. It's because of you that I continue to strive for more, and I can't wait to share with you the success I experience because of your contributions.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Aziza Kibibi and I am an incest, child molestation and domestic violence survivor. My father, MTV Music video director, Aswad Ayinde, started molesting me when I was 8 years old. Victimized by manipulation, coercion, violence and fear, I eventually became pregnant with 5 of my father's children. My father perpetuated his abuse of me by using violence against my mother. She was a battered woman and too afraid to do anything to stop him. As a survivor I am contributing my time, resources, talents and experience to help support other women that have fallen victim to abuse.



The company that I have started, Precious Little Ladies, is focused on combatting child molestation by strengthening the bond between mother and daughter. There are many layers to sexual abuse and domestic violence which in turn creates different ways to combat it. I believe that in taking care of the mother, you take care of the child. With that being said, all women are mothers whether they have biological children or not. 

My company has started a program called "Girl, we've got you covered!". We are looking to provide care packages to women in domestic violence shelters. We will start with 20 bags filled with toiletries and beauty products, to help women in shelters build confidence and get back on their feet. 


 What We Need & What You Get

When a woman is trying to escape her abuser, it is usually done with urgency. The small things that we take for granted on a day to day basis, like lip gloss and hand lotion, aren't the first things she thinks to grab. 

Your donations will be used to purchase enough deodorant, hair care products, Walgreens gift cards, lotion, body wash, toothbrushes, cosmetics, feminine products, washcloths, towels and other necessities, to make 20 care packages for women escaping domestic violence.  These items will be put into a Precious Little Ladies® canvas tote and delivered to a family violence recovery center in Essex County New Jersey (to protect the victims, the name of the facility cannot be disclosed). 

  

This is only the start; even big things have small beginnings. In the near future we will expand our efforts to other facilities in New Jersey, as well as other states in the country. And beyond that we hope to involve Queen Latifah (someone who my father worked with in the past while he was abusing me) and Cover Girl cosmetics, so that our help could reach even further. 

The biggest perk of all is the feeling that your contribution will help facilitate the positive progression of victims of domestic violence; but if that's not enough, perks are as follows. 

  • $10: A special thank you on Twitter plus campaign updates.
  • $15: A special thank you on Twitter and my Aziza Kibibi Facebook page plus campaign updates.
  • $25: A special thank you on Twitter and my Aziza Kibibi Facebook page plus campaign updates and coupons for Proctor and Gamble products.
  • $50: A free download of my book Unashamed: A Life Tainted by Incest Molestation and Violence Volume 1, coupons for Proctor and Gamble products and a special thank you on Twitter and my Aziza Kibibi Facebook page + campaign updates. 
  • $100: A Precious Little Ladies "Girl, we've got you covered" canvas tote bag + a special thank you on Twitter and my Aziza Kibibi Facebook page and campaign updates. Plus a free download of my book and Proctor and Gamble product coupons.
  • $150: A Precious Little Ladies "Girl, we've got you covered" canvas tote bag + a copy of my book Unashamed: A life tainted...+a special thank you on Twitter and my Aziza Kibibi Facebook page plus campaign updates

The Impact

Just like in the case of an emergency on a plane: you are instructed to place the mask on yourself before placing it on your child; mothers need to be cared for so they are better equipped to care for their children. With your help, P.L.L can give victims of domestic violence the bare necessities that they need to build confidence to reestablish themselves. Something as simple as a hair brush or makeup can make a big difference in whether a woman escaping her abuser can feel secure enough to go to a job interview. 

By helping a mom get back on her feet, we help to provide a safe and secure environment for her children. 

Risks & Challenges

We hear everyday that organizations meant to support those less fortunate and positively impact our society, misappropriate their funds. The biggest way to avoid that is to get in there sleeves rolled up and ready to work, and help people in need with sweat equity. The reality of the matter is that our daily schedule and our own lives don't always allow us to do so. Providing tangible products to survivors and victims ensures that they get what they need. Myself and members of my team will personally hand deliver these care bags, and when we post pictures of us preparing them for delivery, you will see exactly where your contribution went. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Benjamin Franklin said that "justice will be served when those who are unaffected are just as outraged as those who are affected". Well I say, we are all affected; which is why you should help. Any contribution you can make either financially or by sharing this campaign on your social networking sites and encourage your family, friends and coworkers to contribute, will go towards the improvement of our community and the uplifting of our women and children. 

Small efforts lead to big things. Contribute a small effort and become part of something big.

story:
Before I tell you about RB Bearings let me start off by introducing myself. My name is Stephen M. Reus and I am a 28 year old entrepreneur. I started my company, RB Bearings, for 3 reasons:

1) Most importantly, the birth of my 1st child Samantha Marie Reus who is due onApril 10th.

2) After working for X years selling bearings for someone else I wanted to start my own business to support my new family.

3) Lastly, I came from a work environment were employees were overworked and underappreciated. I want to create a workplace that values and takes care of its employees. 

So now that you know a little more about me, let me tell you about my new company RB Bearings. Bearings, in case you've never heard of them, are used in every machine that spins! RB Bearings is an importer and stocking company of bearings.

Our largest hurdle to start our business is having to pay upfront for our imported products. This is why you're help is so important to our success. Your contribution will give us the ability to place our first orders.

Your help will not only help start my business but allow me to begin providing the best life possible for my family!

story:
Short & Sweet

Mark and I have decided to put our home on the AirBnB market.  Before we get started there are a few improvements we want to do that will make MoBar Estate a "best of class" experience for our guests:

  • New carpeting upstairs
  • A couple new mattresses
  • Enclose and heat the back patio
  • Updated landscaping in the front

Phoenix is a thriving market for AirBnB.  We expect to lease a minimum of 120 weeks in the next 3 years and we know that our daily / weekly rates will be far below those of other hosts.  Here are some of the perks for our guests:

  • Whole-home reservations
  • Welcoming BBQ for weekly guests
  • On-site caretaker
  • Concierge services offered for additional charge

Other Perks

The Graffiti Wall - call us selfish......asking others to help decorate and add color to the bland, desert landscape of Phoenix.  Seriously, though, kids and adults alike will enjoy leaving their mark.  Don't worry, Mom's and Dad's.....we've got the kids covered......with painting shirts and rubber gloves that is.


Stay tuned.  I'll send out daily updates on our progress and more information on how the MoBar's AirBnB is to become the best in Phoenix!

story:
Having been in both the for-profit and non-profit sectors, it has been frustrating for us to see:

  • The lack of sustainable financial strategies from non-profits (as well as all the hoops they have to jump through just to deliver their services); and
  • The shortsightedness of market-based businesses which fail to incorporate Henry Ford's philosophy on financially empowering communities and their wage earners.

So this is our hybrid, disruptive and transformative on-going solution to making the world a safer and healthier place for our children and their children.

How? You can scroll down a bit (to the "What's Going to Happen..." section) to see exactly what we are going to do with the funds we are raising.

So what's the fun part of the "Change the World" fundraiser?

As we so joyfully explained in our presentation, when you make your donation (starting at just two bucks!) you get to rename any place on Earth or in the Universe.


You can rename The Eiffel Tower after your grand-daughter Annabelle, Chicago becomes Andersonville or The Atlantic Ocean changes into Bob’s Big Pool, though we’re sure you can come up with cooler monikers than Bob’s Big Pool (Sorry Bob!). But remember folks (you too, Bob) it's all for fun and a great cause.

And how do we decide who gets to go first

since there are some really popular places that folks will want to rename?

Simple...the more you donate, the closer you get to the front of the line! And if you're under eighteen (18) years old or are a youth organization we have an extra special program for you (Click Here).

Of course there are plenty of places to rename on this great planet of ours, so no one misses out. But, if you want The United States of America to be named after your lovable grand-dad, you'll probably have to come up with a bit more than two bucks.

But, wait! What if your bank account is not busting at the seams!

Well...we did think about that!

Just get your family and friends to participate and their contribution counts not only to their account, but yours, too! But only in terms of where you "stand" in line. The perks are based on your personal contribution. But it's the collective that will make this project a success!

And that’s what this whole shebang is about, working together in a fun way to make the world a better place.

So you ask...

 "What’s going to happen with all these dollars, euros and yen that we raise?"

We’re going to start a bank! Actually, that's the second step. The first step is promoting a diverse set of high-profit, sustainable businesses and socialpreneurial projects which will provide the much larger amount of capital needed to start the bank. A bank whose profits will be used to invest in an unlimited number of businesses, programs and people who are not only making the world a better place for all of us, but doing it in a way that can be self-sustainable. In other words, making the world a better place without the need for charity.

Not that there is anything wrong with asking for financial support, but as folks who know, there is a whole lot of need and not enough foundation, grant and scholarship money to go around. So, if The Clean Bank (which will provide GREAT financial services to folks like you) and other great entrepreneurs and socialpreneurs can create self-sustaining programs that don’t need those grant dollars, then that leaves those limited financial resources for those programs that REALLY need it!

As you can imagine, The Clean Bank Project is neither an industry- nor time- or geographically-restricted venture. Due to the diversity and depth of our professional backgrounds, the inclusiveness and diversity of our ever-growing network and our practical and sustainable business paradigm, not only do we anticipate continued engagement with our supporters, we plan on transforming this crowd-funding phase into a mutually-beneficial consortium of profitable partnerships and collaborations.

Here’s a few of the national bank-founding projects we currently have in the pipeline:

  • A senior citizen home-ownership program;
  • The Healing Village--where kids, nature, farming and creatives come together;
  • Two feature-length film projects;
  • A licensed multi-event algorithm to transform the fantasy sports industry;
  • An internationally-franchisable cinema-oriented restaurant property;
  • U.S.-based fashion production facility; and
  • A globally-focused first responder development program.

And these are just a few of the incredible collaborative and stakeholder opportunities which will be offered to “Change the World” supporters.

As you can see some great folks have come up with some really fantastic business ideas, which not only support the launch of the The Clean Bank, but will eventually put this collaborative mission along the likes of Bill and Melinda Gates, Sir Richard Branson and other successful folks who found a way to fund great ideas and causes with the wealth they created.

So join up, create some great names and get your friends and family involved!

Ohhhhhhh! Did we mention that we’re also:

  • Creating an interactive map that will feature all the cool new names
  • Building a really big NEW Planet Earth (or whatever it's new name will be!) that will travel to special events for folks to check out
  • Developing our "Change the World" Reality Show which will showcase the supporters, businesses, programs and behind-the-scenes action behind this initiative 

  AND...wait for it...

  • Designing an extremely addictive (well...maybe not that addictive) game built around the Change the World philosophy!

Yup, we’re thinking ahead. But, that’s how we do it at The Clean Bank Project.

Thanks for your support and...

Bon Courage!
story_txt:
Having been in both the for-profit and non-profit sectors, it has been frustrating for us to see:

The lack of sustainable financial strategies from non-profits (as well as all the hoops they have to jump through just to deliver their services); and 

The shortsightedness of market-based businesses which fail to incorporate Henry Ford's philosophy on financially empowering communities and their wage earners.


So this is our hybrid, disruptive and transformative on-going solution to making the world a safer and healthier place for our children and their children.

story:
We all know that electric cars are the future.   They are much cheaper to operate and can be fueled by any number of sources of energy, not just oil. But for years, buying one meant buying an econobox that looked like something out of a cartoon. Then came Tesla Motors. If you have $80,000 to spend, you can have an electric car that is also beautiful. But what about the rest of us? Where is the affordable and  beautiful electric car?

My name is Eleanor Bennett-White. I am a junior in high school with an unusual set of interests: automotive design, technology, and sustainability. I plan to convert a classic and beautiful 1978 Triumph Spitfire to run completely on electricity. Tesla Motors changed how people think about expensive electric cars. I want to change how they think about affordable ones. Also, the automotive industry is a predominately male area. I will reverse the common misconception that  girls (especially ones in high school)  can't work with their hands and achieve important goals. 

To complete this project, I will need $15,000.  Half of this will go towards the lithium-ion batteries, which are the most expensive part of the project. As a start, the original co-founder of Tesla Motors, Martin Eberhard, has already pledged to cover about half the cost of my batteries and to offer design assistance. The rest of the funds will go towards time in a workshop with professionals and buying the parts (motor, controller, etc) needed to complete the conversion. I've planned this conversion very carefully in terms of time, effort, and money. If I don't reach my monetary goal, my project might take a bit longer, but I'm not about to give up.
Breakdown of costs:
  • Batteries: $6,000 ($2,500 has already been pledged)
  • Motor, controller, charger, wiring, and other components: $6,000
  • Shop time and technical assistance: $3,500
  • Other parts: $1000
  • Total: $14,000
Timeline:
  • Research - completed
  • Week 1 - May, 2015 - Remove engine and unnecessary parts from the car
  • Week 2 - June, 2015 - Install electrics, test drive, program
Along with the actual completion of the electric car, I will share my story at middle schools and high schools in my area. By example, I can inspire young people (especially girls) to realize they can get involved with technology as well as help save the planet. Few schools have the mission to encourage girls to be creative thinkers. In my high school, I have always been challenged to think big and go above and beyond the ordinary. I intend to spread that around.
There are a number of problems I may face. The entire project will be a challenge. But as I said earlier, I'm not afraid of getting my hands dirty!

Even if you can't contribute, please share this campaign!

story:
Hi, I'm Robert Fulop.


I'm the founder and sole owner of Banana Sanctuary, a 5 acre organic polyculture farm in Naples, Florida.
My dream is to build an environmentally friendly, sustainable and profitable farm using agroforestry/polyculture/permaculture practices.


During the past 4 years, I invested most of my income and savings into this farming project. I paid cash for the 5 acre land which was barren- no trees, no buildings, no power, no utilities and no topsoil. I knew it was going to take a lot of time, money and energy to build a farm from the ground up. I like a good challenge though, so I got to work!


In February 2013, my work on the farm began. I dug a well, started to build a farm office and planted a bunch of fruit trees. Unfortunately, a lot of these trees died during the first rainy season due to flooding and standing water. Then I planted a bunch more fruit trees. And again a lot of them died at the first light winter frost.

The first 2 years on the farm ended up being mostly experimenting on what works and learning what it takes to grow plants on this land. Once I had this figured out and was able to harvest my first banana bunch, I had a plan. I knew I needed to bring in 1000's of cubic yards of mulch in order to raise up the land’s elevation to prevent standing water and also to build up topsoil. The soil in Southwest Florida is mostly sandy with nearly zero organic matter. Therefore food crops will not grow without bringing in copious amounts of compost/topsoil/mulch. The good news is that there's unlimited mulch at a local landfill. The bad news is that it is a 50 mile round-trip from the farm. Landscaping companies won't drop off free loads of mulch because the farm is rural and there are very bad dirt roads leading to the farm.

A solution seemed clear. I needed a dump truck in order to haul in the mulch myself. Hiring someone to haul in the mulch for me would be very expensive. The dump truck could also be used to haul in fill dirt to build up a long driveway and fix the bad dirt roads leading to the farm. The driveway is so low that there is up to a foot of standing water on it during the rainy season. 90% of the land has standing water from June to October.


I bought a Ford F350 dump truck. It was bit run down, but this was all I could afford. Although it couldn't carry a huge load, it served me well for a short time. Unfortunately, after only a few months, it caught fire due to electrical issues and leaks and it burned down. During this few months I hauled in about 20 loads of mulch and 10 loads of fill dirt. This amount is only a drop in the bucket. Then my backhoe's engine block cracked… my pick-up truck wouldn't start… my lawn tractor's engine blew up… and even my little push-mover died. So now I'm all out of equipment and out of money. I have no mulch for the plants and no fill dirt to fix the road/driveway.

I need your help!

In order to make my dream a reality, I need your support to buy equipment and build more infrastructure. I could easily spend $200K on tools and buildings, but I have to stay realistic, so I'm aiming for $50K. Even if I don't’reach the $50K, I can do a lot with less too. I'm  resourceful and minimalist. All contributions help and go a long way.

A good (used) dump truck that can carry at least 40-50 cubic yards of mulch is about $15,000.
A new (re-manufactured) engine for the backhoe is $5000.
Fill dirt and gravel for driveway and road improvements is $5000.
Depending on how much I can fundraise, I would like to build an irrigation system, a nursery, workshop, storage shed, walk-in cooler and housing for WWOOFing volunteers. My estimated start-up cost for these projects is $25,000.

Our Impact

I want this project to be a great example of a successful farm utilizing natural farming methods. I want to prove that it's possible to grow amazing food with mulch and other free, local, recycled organic matter, without the need for commercial/chemical fertilizers, pesticides, insecticides, etc. I know this works because I have the hands on experience already and small scale success. Those of you who tasted my awesome Namwah bananas also know of the quality my farm produces.  :)

I want to give back to the community by sharing the knowledge and hands-on experience that I have accumulated over the years. I also want to open up my farm to volunteers who want to learn and practice farming skills. I'll be setting up a WWOOFing program, host events and workshops. I have already organized a few meetups/farm tours over the past couple of years. These were a great opportunity to meet like-minded people and share ideas. I look forward to hosting more events in the future as there is a great demand in the community for it.

There's also a growing demand for clean, local produce as more and more people focus on their health, sustainability and the environment. I hope my farming endeavors will inspire lots of others to get into organic farming.
I invite you to have a direct impact on the success of this great farm project! Every financial contribution helps.

If you can’t pledge any money, no worries. Let your friends and family know about this great project. Spread the word on social media! Indiegogo has easy built-in sharing tools you can use.


I greatly appreciate all your help.

Thank you in advance!
Robert

Perk Pictures

That's Bananas T-shirt design (actual t-shirt picture coming soon):

Fruit and Veggies Heart T-shirt design (actual t-shirt picture coming soon):
