story:
The Skin Deep Wines' Story so far..

Conceived in an unassuming shed in McLaren Vale (South Australia), Skin Deep Wines is the love child of three mates who share a passion for wine, tradition and life.

Adam - Creator

The Thrower stands alone, surveys the room and breathes a sigh, 
Someone has to live their life and someone has to die, 
He doesn't want to think about it, nor to be perplexed, 
He strides out of the ring, opens the door and murmurs "Next." 
Then the Divination hit…..IN VINO VERITAS! 


Mitch - Emissary

“A rooster crows only when it sees the light. Put him in the dark and he'll never crow. I have seen the light and I'm crowing.”
The quickest distance between two points is a straight line. Then the wine gets poured! Columbus, Magellan and Polo must have understood this fact.

The journey continues!


Declan - Wrangler

“Never a horse that can’t be rode and never a rider that can’t be throwed”

My Pappy said to me “Son, keep ‘em straight and away from the vines. The ferment does craziness to the mind and the herd!! Make sure they stay focussed  and get ‘em home.” 
This trio is challenged in more ways than one but I do the best I can.

The 'Love lost...' series

In 2013 we released our first (of ultimately three) wine series called 'Love lost...' which is about celebrating people & times that have gone before, paying homage to the roles the vigneron and the winemaker play in the making of good wine and how a memorable bottle of wine narrates moments in time.



How to make a Great Night

We love wine. We spend our days working in and around wine; creating it, perfecting it, describing it, and (no surprises here) drinking it. 

Every now and then, when life permits, we like to head into town to check out the latest cool club, hidden lane-way bar or funky restaurant. These nights out are about forgetting the world of wine for a while, having fun with friends and trying not to injure anyone on the dance floor.  

It was on one of these great nights that the idea of creating a drink that brings people together was born.  We decided that it needed to be a premium drink that appeals to women and men alike, requires the skill of a winemaker and is the ideal drink to start a great night out. 

AfroDizzik Premium Apple Cider

Adam's talents as a winemaker are acknowledged around the world and he has received many awards and stellar reviews of his wines from people and organisations such as Winestate, James Halliday, Qantas, Decanter and many more.

 Ikka Siren


Since that night out Adam has been busy using his winemaking skills to trial and test batches of cider in order to create a premium apple cider (free from any artificial sweeteners, colours or flavouring) made from apple juice. 

Many, many months later and after a lot of trial and error AfroDizzik has been perfected - and we need you help to launch it!


How you can join the Party!

So we've spent months perfecting the cider, researching bottling, packaging and labelling suppliers and costs and are all set to create our first batch of AfroDizzik. We're planning to bottle 1,500 cases and to do this we need $25,000 in crowdfunding to make it happen.

Each case holds 24 x 330ml bottles of AfroDizzik cider and the cost of creating the first 1,500 cases is approximately $45,000. We have $20,000 already available for AfroDizzik and hope to be able to raise the $25,000 needed.

Perks

Supporter & Stickers $5

This perk is available worldwide and will help us along the way to achieving our crowdfunding target.

In appreciation of  your donation we will send you some AfroDizzik stickers also list your name (and business) on our AfroDizzik Supporters Page and keep you informed of our progress.


1 Case + Shipping $80

As a thank you for your donation you'll receive one case from the first batch of AfroDizzik premium apple cider that we produce. The contribution amount includes shipping to metro areas around Australia (sorry we can't ship to international locations). If you are in a country location please add an additional $3.50 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you 

Please note - This perk is available only within Australia.

2 cases + Shipping $150

As a thank you for your donation you'll receive two cases from the first batch of AfroDizzik premium apple cider that we produce. The contribution amount includes shipping to metro areas around Australia (sorry we can't ship to international locations). If you are in a country location please add an additional $5.00 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you.

Please note - This perk is available only within Australia.


Skin Deep Wines T-Shirt + Shipping - $35

This perk is available worldwide and will help us along the way to achieving our crowdfunding target.  

In appreciation of your donation we will send you a Skin Deep Wines T-Shirt, also list your name (and company) on our AfroDizzik Supporters Page and keep you informed of our progress.

If you are in an Australian non-metro location please add an additional $2.50 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you. If you are in an overseas location please add an additional $10.


Mixed Dozen of 'Love lost...' $215

As a thank you for your donation you'll receive one mixed dozen case of Skin Deep Wines' 'Love lost...' series.

The contribution amount includes shipping to metro areas around Australia (sorry we can't ship out of Australia). If you are in a country location please add an additional $5.50 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you.  

A case contains 12 x 750ml of Skin Deep Wines (4 Moscato, 4 Pinot Gris & 4 Shiraz)

Please note - This perk is available only within Australia


T-Shirt + case + shipping $105

As a thank you for your donation you'll receive a case from the first batch of AfroDizzik premium apple cider that we produce + a Skin Deep Wines T-Shirt. 

The contribution amount includes shipping to metro areas around Australia (sorry we can't ship out of Australia). If you are in country locations please add an additional $5.00 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you. 

Please note - This perk is available only within Australia.


T-Shirt + Case AfroDizzik + Case of 'Love lost..' + Shipping $300

As a thank you for your donation you'll receive a case from the first batch of AfroDizzik premium apple cider that we produce + a Skin Deep Wines T-Shirt + a mixed dozen of 'Love lost...' wine.

The contribution amount includes shipping to metro areas around Australia (sorry we can't ship out of Australia). If you are in country locations please add an additional $7.50 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you. 

Please note - This perk is available only within Australia.


VIP @ AfroDizzik Launch Party $2950

As a thank you for your donation you'll receive 5 cases from the first batch of AfroDizzik premium apple cider that we produce + a Skin Deep Wines T-Shirt + a mixed dozen of 'Love lost...' wine and a VIP invite to the AfroDizzik launch party.

The contribution amount includes the cost of economy return flights for 2 people  (from any capital city in Australia). All other costs (such as accommodation, meals and incidentals) are not covered.

Please note - This perk is available only within Australia.


Risks & Challenges

Like any new venture, nothing is ever completely predictable. Before even thinking about launching this crowdfunding campaign on INDIEGOGO we've spent many, many months thinking, planning and developing the creation of AfroDizzik.

We've trialled and tested batches and batches of cider until we felt that we had got the right one. We've spoken to owners of pubs, bottle stores, nightclubs and bars about AfroDizzik and, more importantly, we have asked people to look (and taste) our AfroDizzik cider. All of this experience, and the positive feedback we have received, has given us the courage to take the next step and launch AfroDizzik on INDIEGOGO.

Our goal is to raise $25,000 which will allow us to produce 1,500 cases of AfroDizzik premium apple cider. In the event that we don't hit our target, we will review the project and either decide to go ahead and produce a lower volume of cases (and fulfil each of the perks that have been funded) or refund each of the contributions made.

FAQ

Who designs your labels?

Both the AfroDizzik & 'Love lost...' labels were deigned by Greg Turra - an Adelaide designer & Illustrator - check out some of his other awesome work here.


Who composed the music for the AfroDizzik Youtube clip?

The track is called 'Electric Road' by artist Senbeï - a Paris based musician, composer and DJ. He was born in France and studied music at the Conservatoire de Paris. He then studied cinema in Europe and in Montreal Canada. He has composed original music for short films and produced several animation movies and his recent EP release is Army of Me.


Where will I be able to get AfroDizzik Premium Apple Cider?

Once the INDIEGOGO campaign is successful and we have achieved our target we will start our first bottling run. The first priority will be to distribute the cases to our INDIEGOGO supporters and then we will work with our trade distributor (Pick Drinks) to get AfroDizzik into bottle shops, bars and nightclubs across Australia. 

I live overseas, how can I get AfroDizzik Premium Apple Cider?

Right now, the cost of shipping and taxes would make it too expensive to send you a case of AfroDizzik. We're hoping to be able to fix this and have already started talking to potential distributors in New Zealand, USA and United Kingdom - so watch this space!

Do you plan to produce other ciders as well?

Yes. We would like to produce both a pear cider and a hard apple cider. We are also looking into the cost of producing our cider in cans.

I can't contribute financially but would like to help

We really appreciate any help you can offer and word of mouth is a powerful thing. If you like the sound of what we are doing and would like to see AfroDizzik premium apple cider in your local bottle shop, bar or restaurant then please share this INDIEGOGO campaign and our sites on your social network. 

The legal stuff

It is against the law to sell or supply alcohol to or obtain alcohol on behalf of a person under the age of 18 years. By contributing to this INDIEGOGO campaign and in return receiving a perk of AfroDizzik cider and/or 'Love lost...' wine you vouch that all of the details you have provided are true and correct and that you verify that you are 18 years of age or over. All deliveries of AfroDizzik cider and 'Love lost...' wine must therefore be received and signed for by a person over the age of 18 years. We are unable to post to PO Boxes.

LICENCE NAME: Skin Deep Wines Pty Ltd
LICENCE NUMBER: 51405481


Join the community

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for updates on our upcoming launch and where you can find AfroDizzik.

Our websites at AfroDizzik.com and skindeepwines.com.au gives you more of the Skin Deep Wines story, so check us out there if you haven't already.

If you've got any distribution enquiries please contact our trade distributor, Pick Drinks, on 1300 365 945 or +61 8 7123 2180 - alternatively email them here.
story_txt:
The Skin Deep Wines' Story so far..
Conceived in an unassuming shed in McLaren Vale (South Australia), Skin Deep Wines is the love child of three mates who share a passion for wine, tradition and life.
Adam - Creator


The Thrower stands alone, surveys the room and breathes a sigh, Someone has to live their life and someone has to die, He doesn't want to think about it, nor to be perplexed, He strides out of the ring, opens the door and murmurs "Next." Then the Divination hit…..IN VINO VERITAS! Mitch - Emissary“A rooster crows only when it sees the light. Put him in the dark and he'll never crow. I have seen the light and I'm crowing.”The quickest distance between two points is a straight line. Then the wine gets poured! Columbus, Magellan and Polo must have understood this fact.The journey continues!Declan - Wrangler
“Never a horse that can’t be rode and never a rider that can’t be throwed”My Pappy said to me “Son, keep ‘em straight and away from the vines. The ferment does craziness to the mind and the herd!! Make sure they stay focussed  and get ‘em home.” This trio is challenged in more ways than one but I do the best I can.The 'Love lost...' seriesIn 2013 we released our first (of ultimately three) wine series called 'Love lost...' which is about celebrating people & times that have gone before, paying homage to the roles the vigneron and the winemaker play in the making of good wine and how a memorable bottle of wine narrates moments in time.How to make a Great NightWe love wine. We spend our days working in and around wine; creating it, perfecting it, describing it, and (no surprises here) drinking it. Every now and then, when life permits, we like to head into town to check out the latest cool club, hidden lane-way bar or funky restaurant. These nights out are about forgetting the world of wine for a while, having fun with friends and trying not to injure anyone on the dance floor.  It was on one of these great nights that the idea of creating a drink that brings people together was born.  We decided that it needed to be a premium drink that appeals to women and men alike, requires the skill of a winemaker and is the ideal drink to start a great night out. AfroDizzik Premium Apple CiderAdam's talents as a winemaker are acknowledged around the world and he has received many awards and stellar reviews of his wines from people and organisations such as Winestate, James Halliday, Qantas, Decanter and many more. Ikka SirenSince that night out Adam has been busy using his winemaking skills to trial and test batches of cider in order to create a premium apple cider (free from any artificial sweeteners, colours or flavouring) made from apple juice. Many, many months later and after a lot of trial and error AfroDizzik has been perfected - and we need you help to launch it!How you can join the Party!So we've spent months perfecting the cider, researching bottling, packaging and labelling suppliers and costs and are all set to create our first batch of AfroDizzik. We're planning to bottle 1,500 cases and to do this we need $25,000 in crowdfunding to make it happen.Each case holds 24 x 330ml bottles of AfroDizzik cider and the cost of creating the first 1,500 cases is approximately $45,000. We have $20,000 already available for AfroDizzik and hope to be able to raise the $25,000 needed.PerksSupporter & Stickers $5This perk is available worldwide and will help us along the way to achieving our crowdfunding target.In appreciation of  your donation we will send you some AfroDizzik stickers also list your name (and business) on our AfroDizzik Supporters Page and keep you informed of our progress.1 Case + Shipping $80As a thank you for your donation you'll receive one case from the first batch of AfroDizzik premium apple cider that we produce. The contribution amount includes shipping to metro areas around Australia (sorry we can't ship to international locations). If you are in a country location please add an additional $3.50 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you Please note - This perk is available only within Australia.2 cases + Shipping $150
As a thank you for your donation you'll receive two cases from the first batch of AfroDizzik premium apple cider that we produce. The contribution amount includes shipping to metro areas around Australia (sorry we can't ship to international locations). If you are in a country location please add an additional $5.00 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you.
Please note - This perk is available only within Australia.

Skin Deep Wines T-Shirt + Shipping - $35


This perk is available worldwide and will help us along the way to achieving our crowdfunding target.  
In appreciation of your donation we will send you a Skin Deep Wines T-Shirt, also list your name (and company) on our AfroDizzik Supporters Page and keep you informed of our progress.
If you are in an Australian non-metro location please add an additional $2.50 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you. If you are in an overseas location please add an additional $10.


Mixed Dozen of 'Love lost...' $215


As a thank you for your donation you'll receive one mixed dozen case of Skin Deep Wines' 'Love lost...' series.


The contribution amount includes shipping to metro areas around Australia (sorry we can't ship out of Australia). If you are in a country location please add an additional $5.50 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you.  
A case contains 12 x 750ml of Skin Deep Wines (4 Moscato, 4 Pinot Gris & 4 Shiraz)
Please note - This perk is available only within Australia

T-Shirt + case + shipping $105

As a thank you for your donation you'll receive a case from the first batch of AfroDizzik premium apple cider that we produce + a Skin Deep Wines T-Shirt. 
The contribution amount includes shipping to metro areas around Australia (sorry we can't ship out of Australia). If you are in country locations please add an additional $5.00 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you.   
Please note - This perk is available only within Australia.

T-Shirt + Case AfroDizzik + Case of 'Love lost..' + Shipping $300

As a thank you for your donation you'll receive a case from the first batch of AfroDizzik premium apple cider that we produce + a Skin Deep Wines T-Shirt + a mixed dozen of 'Love lost...' wine.
The contribution amount includes shipping to metro areas around Australia (sorry we can't ship out of Australia). If you are in country locations please add an additional $7.50 (in custom amount) to cover the extra cost of shipping to you. 
Please note - This perk is available only within Australia.

VIP @ AfroDizzik Launch Party $2950
As a thank you for your donation you'll receive 5 cases from the first batch of AfroDizzik premium apple cider that we produce + a Skin Deep Wines T-Shirt + a mixed dozen of 'Love lost...' wine and a VIP invite to the AfroDizzik launch party.
The contribution amount includes the cost of economy return flights for 2 people  (from any capital city in Australia). All other costs (such as accommodation, meals and incidentals) are not covered.
Please note - This perk is available only within Australia.
Risks & ChallengesLike any new venture, nothing is ever completely predictable. Before even thinking about launching this crowdfunding campaign on INDIEGOGO we've spent many, many months thinking, planning and developing the creation of AfroDizzik.
We've trialled and tested batches and batches of cider until we felt that we had got the right one. We've spoken to owners of pubs, bottle stores, nightclubs and bars about AfroDizzik and, more importantly, we have asked people to look (and taste) our AfroDizzik cider. All of this experience, and the positive feedback we have received, has given us the courage to take the next step and launch AfroDizzik on INDIEGOGO.
Our goal is to raise $25,000 which will allow us to produce 1,500 cases of AfroDizzik premium apple cider. In the event that we don't hit our target, we will review the project and either decide to go ahead and produce a lower volume of cases (and fulfil each of the perks that have been funded) or refund each of the contributions made.FAQWho designs your labels?Both the AfroDizzik & 'Love lost...' labels were deigned by Greg Turra - an Adelaide designer & Illustrator - check out some of his other awesome work here.Who composed the music for the AfroDizzik Youtube clip?


The track is called 'Electric Road' by artist Senbeï - a Paris based musician, composer and DJ. He was born in France and studied music at the Conservatoire de Paris. He then studied cinema in Europe and in Montreal Canada. He has composed original music for short films and produced several animation movies and his recent EP release is Army of Me.Where will I be able to get AfroDizzik Premium Apple Cider?Once the INDIEGOGO campaign is successful and we have achieved our target we will start our first bottling run. The first priority will be to distribute the cases to our INDIEGOGO supporters and then we will work with our trade distributor (Pick Drinks) to get AfroDizzik into bottle shops, bars and nightclubs across Australia. I live overseas, how can I get AfroDizzik Premium Apple Cider?Right now, the cost of shipping and taxes would make it too expensive to send you a case of AfroDizzik. We're hoping to be able to fix this and have already started talking to potential distributors in New Zealand, USA and United Kingdom - so watch this space!Do you plan to produce other ciders as well?Yes. We would like to produce both a pear cider and a hard apple cider. We are also looking into the cost of producing our cider in cans.I can't contribute financially but would like to helpWe really appreciate any help you can offer and word of mouth is a powerful thing. If you like the sound of what we are doing and would like to see AfroDizzik premium apple cider in your local bottle shop, bar or restaurant then please share this INDIEGOGO campaign and our sites on your social network. 

The legal stuff
It is against the law to sell or supply alcohol to or obtain alcohol on behalf of a person under the age of 18 years. By contributing to this INDIEGOGO campaign and in return receiving a perk of AfroDizzik cider and/or 'Love lost...' wine you vouch that all of the details you have provided are true and correct and that you verify that you are 18 years of age or over. All deliveries of AfroDizzik cider and 'Love lost...' wine must therefore be received and signed for by a person over the age of 18 years. We are unable to post to PO Boxes.LICENCE NAME: Skin Deep Wines Pty LtdLICENCE NUMBER: 51405481

Join the community
Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for updates on our upcoming launch and where you can find AfroDizzik.Our websites at AfroDizzik.com and skindeepwines.com.au gives you more of the Skin Deep Wines story, so check us out there if you haven't already.If you've got any distribution enquiries please contact our trade distributor, Pick Drinks, on 1300 365 945 or +61 8 7123 2180 - alternatively email them 
here.

story:
Our Aims:

We have 2 aims:
1) To create the world's largest directory of vetted service providers in our industry.
2) To provide a simple easy to use platform to connect customers and service providers, provide booking, payment and management capabilities.

Question - How do you make Functional Sexy?

We have a very clear goal and functionality that we want to bring to market that will help the end customer and businesses.  But how do we make that attractive and pull in the punters?  We hope our open and honest approach is the best way.  Please pass this on and talk about it.  We appreciate all the help we can get, because 'Dreams can come True'.

Introducing Dochsa

"Ever looked for a therapist in your local area or while travelling, via a search engine?  It spews out a list of results offering the service, and some sites may give reviews.  But how many of these businesses are certified and insured and who has vetted them?  I have been really disheartened when searching for a bona fide therapist and end up with a hack that doesn't have a clue and their misinterpretation of a traditional therapy like Reflexology turns into a sloppy foot rub!  We need to insist on quality, and not give in to empathy of bad service.  I created Dochsa to alleviate that mystery and create a database of people who are trusted to practice with a conscience, training and passion for their clients wellbeing."

We were inspired to create a way to facilitate your health, wellbeing and bring balance to a world of chaos.  Our aim is to demystify the world of male and female beauty, traditional and complementary therapies using plain language with our easy to use mobile apps and website.  Need your beard trimmed, an Aromatherapy facial, perfect nails or to chill with your friends in a spa?  Dochsa can help. 

You have access to a worldwide booking tool and can choose a provider with ease after reading previous customer experiences.  All our providers are fully trained, insured, vetted and backed by the recognised institute.  We will even send you a booking reminder, or you can connect your online calendar.  SMS service available in selected countries.

You can view and manage all the bookings you have made through our partner network globally, offering a unique view which will allow for better treatment planning.  You can choose to share your previous notes and treatments with new partners to ensure consistency but knowing that your data is protected and you choose who to share it with. 

We act as a 3rd party and only release your payment to the provider once you have had the treatment, we use a simple voucher system so no need to carry cash.  You can even leave a tip later if you want to, via our mobile app or online tool.  If you need to request a refund you can without having to negotiate with the provider.  This is all handled by Dochsa thus eliminating stress and conflict so you can feel ZEN.  You can now relax and feel wonderful on the inside and look amazing on the outside.

…from Dochsa with love…

What We Need & Your Rewards for Helping

As you can imagine there is no such tool available today, which focusses on this specific market.  So we have created a tool from the ground up, with the customer and service provider in mind.  Adding additional functionality like the vetting service, the cashless system and clear simple language for both men and women to understand what they are booking.

We need to raise £100,000 to cover the cost of the tool, the website, the mobile apps and to help fund marketing costs.

We will use any and all funds to continue the development of this project, even if we do not reach our goal.  Your support is appreciated either way.

How you will Help

You can be instrumental in achieving this dream and benefit from this great service, as a client or as a therapist.

Travel? Looking for a local gym in Toronto, a Swedish massage in India or a colour touch up on a business trip in Johannesburg?  This used to be a pain!  Well no more, you can book services, read reviews and pay online, safe in the knowledge that none of this information is shared. 

You can make an informed decision with the peace of mind that your payment and personal details are protected.

S.W.O.T

Donovan has years of experience with online and physical business, has travelled extensively, held senior Directorial Roles at Global IT companies, is a Trained Holistic Therapist and he brings his passion and knowledge to the project.  Andrew is a trained therapist, with a background in IT administration and ecommerce. 

We know that there are other tools and websites out there that offer a similar service, they are backed by large multinational businesses, which often mars them and they become inflexible and robot like.  None of our competitors  offer a personal treatment log, or vet and verify all therapists and service providers.

We really believe in this project, not only because we feel there is a need but because we can't wait to use it ourselves.  Our research has confirmed that there is a requirement for this tool and that if launched it would be successful.

The tools, website and mobile phone apps are being developed by a trusted team in India however when working with a team outside of your own it is a potential risk.  However we have already visited the team in India to ensure that they understand what we require.

We know we are young and new, but that is what we feel makes it fresh and exciting.  We have bet our lives on the project as we believe in it.

Scream it From the Roof Tops

We would really appreciate if you tweet or Facebook about our project, Google+ or any way of telling the world about our project is appreciated.

There are share tools right here, so please use them.

We hope that when the tool is launched you will use it and feel the same way that we do.

Video

I realise the video is not professionally filmed and edited.  We wanted to put every last penny that we owned into the tool, so please take this into account.

- Donovan

story:
Short Summary 

Hi, My name is James "Jordan" Stephenson" I am doing a crowd-funding campaign to get my restaurant back on its feet.  We where open briefly but due to lack of funds we had to close.  We will still feature many of our signature items and will be bringing in more southern classics.  As always we pride ourselves in making things from scratch, and using local ingredients when available.  We will also be using a lot of the feedback we have gotten along the way for the reopening and do our best to make everyone happy.  This building means a lot to me, I used to come to the Woodland Inn with my father as a child before he passed away, and he actually met my mother there.  I was young but I always remember a fun, lively, positive atmosphere and a place where people loved to be.  I want to bring that back to the community.  If you pledge to this campaign you have my promise of hard work to ensure a great dining experience and a fantastic value! 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are seeking $30,000 to get back open
  • We need to fix a few small repairs including: pipes, our walk in cooler, some external repairs and other odds and ends.
  • We also need to pay off a few bills
  • We need money for our initial stock
  • We need a certain amount of working capital for first 6 months bills and labor

If you can help us get reestablished there are some great Perks for you - from a simple thanks on our website to half price beer for life...and even free Bacon!

The Impact

Supporting this campaign supports entreneurship, small business, jobs, America, our local region, and a young mans dream.  This community and Northern Kentucky in general need a down home from scratch restaurant with a little flavor and personality.  We want to be that restaurant, please support us and be a part of something spectacular!  We want to be a big part of the community and host benefits and fundraisers when they are needed.  Also we want to be your go to spot when you want to celebrate or take your family out for a great meal!   We are proud to be part of the KY proud program which means we source some of our menu from local farms from the great state of KY!  So supporting us supports many other hard working Kentuckians!  We plan on making a BIG positive impact in our community!

Risks & Challenges

One of the big things we have to do this time around is find some great staff.  We do have some great staff members returning, but we will need more.  If you are passionate about a local and organic food option being available in the Northern Kentucky area contact us to setup an interview.  We will also need to manage getting everything done quickly but we are passionate about what we do and plan on working long hours to get open fast.  We feel with all the knowledge we gained from being open earlier, we have low risk of failure!  We will make sure this happens and won't rest until it does! 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute don't worry!  You can help us by sharing our campaign on Facebook, telling anyone you know about it, or liking and sharing our website and Facebook page.  We appreciate you reading about us and any potential help you may offer is much appreciated!  We have some really great perks for our funders!!
